modules.description: Provides bitwise operations for manipulating binary data, including packing and unpacking bits into integers, and performing bitwise logical operations. Works with integers and bit vectors of varying lengths. Used to efficiently encode and decode binary protocols and manage memory-aligned data structures.

The module provides operations for constructing, analyzing, and optimizing Binary Decision Diagrams (BDDs), including logical combinations, traversal, restriction, simplification, and set operations. It works with BDDs, integer variables, and nodes, enabling tasks like variable reordering, structural inspection, and conversion between representations. Use cases include formal verification, logic synthesis, and symbolic computation where efficient manipulation of Boolean functions is required.
